author: not.rithik
content: Hey, I think I've done all the reading I needed to and now I can start testing. Would you like to meet on Thursday/Friday? Also do let me know your timezone so we can coordinate the meeting. Mine is IST (UTC + 5 30)

content: Hey, can we meet on Thursday? My Time Zone is GST (UTC + 4:00), pretty close.
